name: InRole
short: A cog that shows the members having a given discord role, with the ability to set filters that allow non admin users to see role members of roles that pass those filters
description: InRole is a cog that allows users to view the members of a given discord role. It also provides the ability to set filters that allow non-admin users to see role members of roles that pass those filters. This cog is useful for server administrators who want to keep track of the members of a particular role.
end_user_data_statement: This cog does not store user data persistently.
install_msg:
Thanks for installing InRole!
Please report any bugs/log output in *#support_other-cogs* on the cog support server (https://discord.gg/GET4DVk).
author: crayyy_zee
